New Records: Adam Zampa scored 29 off 19 balls and took 3 wickets for 21 runs, earning him the Player of the Match award
Key Match Events: Jonny Bairstow was dismissed from the first ball of the chase
Adam Zampa's 3 for 21 was decisive in the match
Chris Woakes was dismissed for 32 off 33 balls
Adil Rashid was dismissed for 20 off 15 balls
Marcus Stoinis took a catch to dismiss Woakes
Adam Zampa took a hanger to dismiss Rashid
Pre-Game Insights: England's captain Jos Buttler mentioned that his own form has been the biggest concern for the team
Australia's captain Pat Cummins mentioned that his team has been improving every game and that they have a lot of pride in their fielding
Post-Match Reflections: England's captain Jos Buttler expressed disappointment and frustration with the team's performance
Australia's captain Pat Cummins mentioned that his team played brilliantly and that every game has improved
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, India
The match was a day-night match and was played under the lights
The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
